comments.body: If you want to also add a PR to this repo and file https://github.com/mattclay/aws-terminator/blob/master/aws/policy/compute.yaml with these, it's where we deploy the permissions for CI. The hacking/ directory policies make running the tests in contributors' own accounts more convenient but the permissions aren't all strict enough to actually use for CI.

Hi @s-hertel. I took a crack at it, but I am not very sure about the change. Please let me know if this works -
https://github.com/mattclay/aws-terminator/pull/68
